name: Khara Kapas
slogan: Khara Kapas started with the belief that well designed clothes made from pure fabrics and many many many
description: Based in London, England. Originally founded in 2013, we create both classic vintage eyewear styles and contemporary designs. ToyShades® are innovative, dynamically designed and reflect our team’s dedication to producing reassuringly affordable eyewear. Our collection of sunglasses offer high quality products - without the heavy price-tag. The ToyShades® team have taken on board all the technological advancements harvested over the last twenty years. We combine these cutting-edge advancements with a ground-breaking approach to product design. For 2018, we have launched our trademarked PENTOPTIC® lenses. Our PENTOPTIC® lenses provide ultimate protection for your eyes. All our lenses are UV400 (intercepting 99 to 100 per cent of UVA and UVB light) and conform to the highest international standards. All our lenses are UV400 (intercepting 99 to 100 per cent of UVA and UVB light)

name: Biko
description: Anothersole has built the ultimate everyday shoe for you. Experience the comfort of a running shoe with the style of a timeless classic in 150 colours.Using premium leather from the world’s finest tanneries,they are stitched onto an ultra flexi-rubber soles and hides an ergonomic sports footbed for long wearing comfort without the bulkiness of sneakers At prices from $109, you are getting a very high quality leather product at an honest price. The shoes are incredibly versatile and easy to wear for all occasions.
